defaultcond.name: Running Normal
defaultcond.description: Running States Typically Clear Root Cause and Have no Reason unless Multiple Running States Used

defaultcond.name: Faulted - New Fault
defaultcond.description: Fail States Must Produce a Local Reason and Optional Root Reason

defaultcond.name: Blocked Primary
defaultcond.description: Primary Discharge - Blocked May Have Remote Reference and Separate Root Reason Code

defaultcond.name: Starved Primary
defaultcond.description: Primary Infeed - Starved May Have Remote Reference and Separate Root Reason Code

defaultcond.name: Blocked Secondary
defaultcond.description: Secondary Discharge - Blocked May Have Remote Reference and Separate Root Reason Code

defaultcond.name: Starved Secondary
defaultcond.description: Secondary Infeed - Starved May Have Remote Reference and Separate Root Reason Code

defaultcond.name: Bypassed
defaultcond.description: Bypass States Used When Equipment Not Selected. Overrides Run Status

defaultcond.name: Planned
defaultcond.description: Idle States Are Typically Lower Priority than Run but Higher than Automatic Downtime States
